ygData.subject: Re: Oh yeah.. Lavastorm notes 2
ygData.msgSnippet: I bought 2 +3 int earrings last night for 35pp a piece...not sure if that was the going rate or if I got ripped off, don t really care either :) brings my
ygData.messageBody:
I bought 2 +3 int earrings last night for 35pp a piece...not sure if that
was the going rate or if I got ripped off, don't really care either :)
brings my intelligence to a grand total of 156 from 134, it's nice to see
the difference in mana when I equip all my stuff now. (one of the few neat
things about dying)



----- Original Message -----
From: Tony B <tonyb72@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 5:49 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Oh yeah.. Lavastorm notes 2


> From: Tony B <tonyb72@...>
>
> ya, i guess we forgot to mention that everything in lavastorm will resist
> heat blood =)
> as far as lifedraw, i always make the top 3 spells my new pet spell, new
> ward spell, and new lifetap spell. damn i love that lifedraw! it was
worth
> turning L12 just for that. and it is more mana efficient than lifespike,
> but its a bigger chunk. at L15 it doesnt really hurt the mana tho.
> btw, are there any +int earings, or just the aged ones from before they
> changed jewelcraft? and what are they worth around?
